US BANK HOLIDAY: February 20, 2023 – USD payments paused
Bitstamp USD payments paused on Monday, February 20, 2023, due to a public holiday in the US.
US bank holiday – January 16 (Martin Luther King Jr. Day)
Bitstamp USD payments paused on Monday, January 16, 2023, due to a public holiday in the US.
BANK HOLIDAYS: December 26, 2022, and January 2, 2023 – Payments paused
Bitstamp payments paused on December 26, 2022, and January 2, 2023, due to public holidays.
We're supporting Mt. Gox creditors with an exclusive pricing deal
Bitstamp welcomes all Mt. Gox creditors with an exclusive trading fee offer of 0.1% of total trading volume.
US BANK HOLIDAY: November 11, 2022 – USD payments paused
Bitstamp USD payments paused on Friday, November 11, 2022, due to a public holiday in the US.
Slovenian BANK HOLIDAYS: October 31 & November 1, 2022 – EUR payments paused
Bitstamp EUR payments paused on Monday, October 31, and Tuesday, November 1, 2022, due to public holidays in Slovenia.
Bitstamp has been named CryptoCompare’s top-rated centralized exchange
Bitstamp has achieved the top spot in the latest CryptoCompare Exchange Benchmark for centralized crypto exchanges.
Important information in support of Mt. Gox creditors
Bitstamp is pleased to announce that we are supporting the rehabilitation process for Mt. Gox creditors.
US BANK HOLIDAY: September 5, 2022 – USD payments paused

Due to Labor Day in the US on September 5, 2022, Bitstamp’s bank payment
clearing system for incoming and outgoing USD payments will be paused.

USD deposits and withdrawals will be processed the next business day – on
Tuesday, September 6, 2022.

EUR and GBP deposits and withdrawals will be processed without interruptions.

If you need any help, please contact us atsupport@bitstamp.net.

We wish our US customers a very prosperous and joyous Labor Day!
Bitstamp Registered as Virtual Asset Service Provider in Italy
We’re delighted to announce that we have registered as a Virtual Asset Service Provider (VASP) in Italy.
